name: whoami (Karma Chameleon)
description:
move with arrow keys. touch NPCs to speak to them and ask the central question.

this game is a submission to the trans joy jam hosted by stargazersasha. the biggest source of trans joy in my life is having the littlest parts of me (and maybe especially the parts that were unknown to me) seen and recognized. this game is a collection of autobiographical reminders of the little things my trans partner says and shows me that help me situate, experience, and enjoy the trans body that i live in. 

this game was made in bipsi, which is a clone of bitsy; both are game engines for quickly and easily building this sort of in-browser pixel art walk'n'talk experience.
